org.jogger.config
Class DefaultControllerLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.jogger.config.DefaultControllerLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerLoader
public class DefaultControllerLoader
extends Object
implements ControllerLoader

This is the default controller loading strategy. It loads the controller from the classpath using the current Java loader.

Author:
German Escobar

public Object load(String controllerName)
            throws ConfigurationException
Description copied from interface: ControllerLoader
Returns a controller based on the received argument.

Specified by:
load in interface ControllerLoader
Parameters:

Returns:
a controller object or null if the controller is not found.
